and we're already starting to see this
with like Ben Bernanke coming out saying
well the economy's gonna be crashing in
2020 the IMF is out there saying the

can see right now that they're pushing
this agenda now if you look at the

just like in 2008 everyone thought that
everything was great and if you go back

and then what happened everything fell
apart they were completely wrong just
because you're looking at this illusion
and you're looking at the illusion that
the economy's doing well in the
manipulating while the numbers doesn't

that this is really what the economy is

because if you look back in 2008
everyone who was investing in those

thought they were secure triple-a baby
they're they're great and then they come

illusionary numbers in the housing
market the stock exchange all of this

and if you listen to the NFIB small

unemployment's very low stock market is
way up corporate profits are up
everything looks great the question is

because wages are stagnant and inflation

and up well they're saying their biggest

generation is
